descr: People staring (canteen/bus), someone asked what was the device (office), someone makes jokes (but in a nice way, colleagues at the institute). You feel you are capturing other people's attention
future_use: I felt a little bit less confident when taking public transports or just moving around the institute, it will not stop me by doing everyday activities but it was interesting to observe an automatic tendency to avoid the social contexts

descr: General discomfort due to the glasses on ears (it is general so it's not limited to a certain location)
future_use: I have to remove them for a short period after some time that I wear the glasses

descr: I guy thought he was filmed, so he said "Halo" to the sensor, even if it was not recording and I was not looking at him
